meanings.definition: A single eyebrow that extends across the forehead.
meanings.sent1: Her unibrows made her stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent2: He had thick unibrows that gave him a unique look.
meanings.sent3: The unibrows on the painting made the subject look serious.
meanings.sent4: The unibrows of the mountain range connected the two peaks.
meanings.sent5: The unibrows on the caterpillar were surprisingly symmetrical.

meanings.definition: The presence of a single eyebrow that connects in the middle.
meanings.sent1: The unibrows on the statue gave it a wise appearance.
meanings.sent2: She tried to pluck the unibrows but ended up making them thinner.
meanings.sent3: The unibrows on the cartoon character made it look funny.
meanings.sent4: The unibrows of the bridge connected the two sides of the river.
meanings.sent5: The unibrows on the doll were drawn with a black marker.
